Text: David Irvine is a notorious holocaust denier. He has been successfully pursued in court and shown to be a liar and a fabricator of facts. Historical authorities have denounced his fabrications from one end of the globe to the other. This film continues his quest to defend the poor Nazis who aren't to blame for WWII, at least according to Irvine. A despicable man if there ever was one!
Copy pasting your lie onto all my torrents, doesn't make it true.

All the world powers were to blame for WW2, that's the USA, UK, Germany, USSR, Japan, and the zionists themselves, who wanted to steal Palestine, and who were before the war, only 10% of Jewry. David Irving is a world renouned historian who was jailed for thought crimes. There's nothing quite so fake as a zionist who claims to be righteous. Tell me, why did the Soviets convict the Auschwitz work camp staff for less than 300,000 deaths, not all Jews? Why was the memorial plaque changed to millions less, and then removed altogether? Why do Jews lie so much? To steal while they squeal.
